Saravanan M wrote:
> Hello Everybody
> 
> I want to avoid robots while crawling. how to do
> that ? I am confused with Custom Build robots and
> robots ignoring options..
> 
> Pls anyone explain these problems..
> 
> Awiting for your valuable reply..
> 
> Regards
> Saravanan M

Saravanan,

Are you talking about avoiding _robot traps_?  The robot or web crawler 
is the software that actually crawls the web.  You may find this article 
helpful:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_crawler

If by "robots ignoring options" you are talking about the robots 
exclusion protocol (robots.txt), you'll find this useful:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robots.txt_protocol

Regads,
Frank
